name: The_polygon
description:
The_polygon is a complex puzzle platformer in which there is a certain plot. nevertheless, the plot does not play a role in it. 

You have to complete all 14 levels and save money for your own level.
I apologize for the lack of music and sounds. possible they will be added later.
I also apologize for possible grammatical mistakes.

Hello.
You have been selected as the best soldier to participate in testing a new development.
So let's start testing.
You must pass all the polygons provided to you.
On the polygons, you can change the time to overcome obstacles.
At the end of testing, we will evaluate your actions and the number of your failures.
Good Luck)

This game supports multiplayer but it don't have own servels(. So I decided to turn off this function. If you want to see it then let me know!
